Abstract: The evolution of construction robotics has transitioned from mere automation to fostering human–robot collaboration, marking a significant leap in architectural and construction methodologies. This paper delves into the integration of advanced sensing technologies and industrial robots within the construction sector, highlighting the shift towards collaborative environments where humans and robots work in unison. By examining current trends and technological advancements, the study underscores the potential of construction robotics to enhance efficiency, safety, and precision in building processes. Furthermore, it explores the challenges and opportunities presented by human–robot collaboration, paving the way for innovative architectural designs and construction techniques that could redefine the future of the industry.
